name: Blundstone Women's Series 1448 Boots - Women's
description: Versatile and astonishingly comfortable. This is a riff on a classic Blundstone Boot, with a higher cut, narrower gore panel (outlined with brogueing detail) and a slightly more feminine look than other Blundies.Weatherproof, full-grain leather upper.Upper is seamlessly fused to sole to provide resilient construction.Leather-lined for durability and comfort.Polyurethane midsole provides cushioning.Pull loop offers extra leverage.Steel shank adds torsional stability.Thermo-urethane outsole is highly abrasion resistant and provides exceptional traction.Round toe, medium width.Includes an extra set of footbeds for fit adjustment.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
